info.title: Esankhyiki Api
info.description: API for admin user authentication, product management including product creation.

post.description: Authenticate an admin user by validating username and password and return an access token.

get.description: Search for metadata records based on query parameters.

parameters.name: latest
parameters.description: Whether the metadata is the latest version (true or false)

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user associated with the metadata

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Search by title in the metadata

get.description: Retrieves the details of a user by username. Only users with the title 'CC_User' can access this endpoint.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to fetch

delete.description: Deletes a user by username. Only users with the title 'CC_User' can delete users, except 'CC_User' itself.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to delete

put.description: Updates a user's details. Only users with the title 'CC_User' can update other users.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to update

post.description: Create a new product in the system. Only developers can create products.

405.description: Unauthorized user (only admin can create the product)

error.example: Only admin can create the product

get.description: Retrieve all products. Only admin or domain users can access.

405.description: Only admin or domain users can access the product data

get.description: Retrieve a product by its ID

405.description: Only admin or domain users can access the product data

put.description: Update an existing product. Only admin and domain users can edit products.

405.description: Unauthorized user (only admin and domain users can edit the product)

error.example: Only admin and domain users can edit

delete.description: Delete an existing product. Only admin users can delete products.

405.description: Unauthorized user (only admin can delete the product)

error.example: Only admin can delete the product

503.description: Service unavailable or internal server error

error.example: Unable to delete the product: [error details]

post.description: Create a new agency in the system. Only admin users can create agencys.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to missing or invalid token

403.description: Only admin users can create agencys

error.example: Only admin can create the agency

get.description: Retrieve all agencys. Only admin, developers, or domain users can access.

403.description: Only developers or domain users can access the agencys

get.description: Retrieve a agency by its category

403.description: Only authorized users can access this endpoint

error.example: Unable to fetch data from agency Table

put.description: Update an existing agency. Only admin and domain users can edit agencys.

error.example: Error in Updating agency data: [error details]

delete.description: Delete a agency by its category. Only admin users can delete agencys.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of the agency to be deleted

200.description: agency and associated data deleted successfully

msg.example: agency and associated data successfully deleted

403.description: Unauthorized user (only admin can delete agencys)

error.example: Only admin can delete the agency
Unable to delete the agency: [error details]

put.description: Update metadata for a product. Only admin users or the owner of the product can update metadata.

parameters.name: Product
parameters.description: The product for which metadata needs to be updated.

Product.description: The product ID associated with the metadata .

msg.description: A message indicating the success of the operation.

statusCode.description: Indicates the status of the operation (true for success).

403.description: Invalid user. Only admin or authorized users can update metadata.

error.example: Invalid user. Only admin or authorized users can update metadata.

data.description: The metadata for the specified product.

msg.description: A message indicating the success of the operation.

statusCode.description: Indicates the status of the operation (true for success).

delete.description: Delete metadata for a specific product. Only admin or the product owner can delete metadata.

parameters.name: Product
parameters.description: The product ID for which metadata needs to be deleted.

403.description: Unauthorized user (only admin or product owner can delete metadata)

error.example: Only admin or product owner can delete the metadata

get.summary: Get Metadata by Product and Version

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unable to fetch data

post.description: Create metadata for a product. Only admin users can create metadata.

Product.description: The identifier of the product for which metadata is being created.

data.description: The metadata details as a JSON object.

msg.description: A message indicating the success of the operation.

statusCode.description: Indicates the status of the operation (true for success).

405.description: Only admin users can create metadata

error.example: Only admin users can create metadata.

msg.description: A message indicating the success of the operation.

statusCode.description: Indicates the status of the operation (true for success).
